A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you hated Luke and Han in the original series and wanted to see them grow into pathetic losers\, The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi are the films for you. If you were also eager to see a girl who\, with almost no training and while had not believed in the force a week ago\, beat up on someone who has had years of training in the force\, and then get no real explanation as to why Rey is apparently God\, this is the film for you. If you really hated Star Wars and wanted to see it jump off a cliff\, this film is for you.
